id.description: The unique identifier of the creative

updated_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the creative was last updated

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the creative was created

name.description: The name or title given to the creative

ad_account_id.description: The ID of the advertising account linked to the creative

type.description: The type or category of the creative

packaging_status.description: The status of the packaging for the creative

review_status.description: The overall review status of the creative

review_status_details.description: Additional details related to the review status

shareable.description: Indicates if the creative is shareable

forced_view_eligibility.description: Whether the creative is eligible for forced views

headline.description: The headline or title of the creative

brand_name.description: The name of the brand associated with the creative

call_to_action.description: The call to action prompt for the creative

render_type.description: The type of rendering used for the creative

top_snap_media_id.description: The ID of the media file for the top snap

top_snap_crop_position.description: The crop position for the top snap of the creative

web_view_properties.description: Properties related to the web view functionality when a user interacts with the ad.

url.description: The URL to be loaded in the web view

allow_snap_javascript_sdk.description: Whether to allow the use of Snap JavaScript SDK in the web view

use_immersive_mode.description: Whether to use immersive mode in the web view

deep_link_urls.description: List of deep link URLs associated with the web view

block_preload.description: Indicates if preloading is blocked for the web view

ad_product.description: The type of Snapchat advertising product used for the creative

ad_to_place_properties.description: Properties related to the ad to be displayed within the Snapchat interface.

place_id.description: The ID of the place where the ad is to be displayed
